description:
Made in 48 hours for GMTK Jam 2019. Theme was "Only One".

Player gets one jump to complete the level.

---

Left/Right Arrows for horizontal movement

Down Arrow for ground pound while falling

Spacebar for jump

---

Incomplete prototype, but you can move around and there are colours. (Box gets stuck on button. Button has no function attached. No win condition. No exit condition.)

We'll continue working on this and flesh it out after the jam.
